venue.name: Microsoft New England Research & Development Center (NERD)

item.description:
Boston New Tech Meetup #5, Tuesday May 17. Doors open at 6:30 at NERD in the ATTUCKS/ADAMS combined room, presentations start at 7:30. 6 Presenters each giving 5 minutes of demo followed by 5 minutes of questions. Snacks provided by NERD and our event sponsor Open Hosting. See what's new and cool in the local startup scene!


Here's the lineup:

  1. Vinay Singh / Skill-Guru / @skillguru
  2. John Brayton / CloudPull / @goldenhillsw
  3. Vinay Gidwaney / DailyFeats / @thedailyfeats
  4. Michael Kowalchik / Smarterer / @smarterer
  5. Travell Perkins / RGB Daily / @rgbdaily
  6. Brian Chan / mobiLIFE / @mobiLIFEinc

Please use the hashtag #bnt5 to promote and discuss this event on twitter.
item.name: Boston New Tech Meetup May 2011 #BNT5
